name: Endra's Flame
description:
Controls:

  • A/D = Left/Right
  • S = Go Down through rock platforms and tree branches
  • Space = Jump/ Double Jump
  • E = Speak 
  • Left Click = Dash (does not do damage)
  • Right Click = Shoot (max five shots with each taking one second to recharge)

Enjoy the prototype, feel free to leave any critique you might have!
